name: EconMF
author: NecroMancer8104
detail: Economy system made with Mineflow v3.3.0.

contents: §aWelcome to Pocketmine's most complex economy system!
§a/econ bank ~ Manage commands with a simple menu
§a/econ bal [user] ~ See your money or other players' money
§a/econ pay <user> <quantity> ~ Pay to a player a specific amount of money
§a/econ give <user> <amount> ~ Give money to a player
§e/econ config ~ Edit EconMF Settings (can be dangerous)
§a/econ give <user> <amount> ~ Give money to a player
§e/econ config ~ Edit EconMF Settings (can be dangerous)
§cThere is no player named {args.1} in the database.
§cView other players balance is disabled on this server.
§cYou don't have enough money to make this transaction.
§cYou don't have enough money to make this transaction.
§cOffline payments are not supported on this server.
§cThere is no player named {args.1} in the database.
§cThere is no player with the name {args.1} in the database.
§cOperator commands are disabled on this server.
§cYou do not have permission to use this command.
§cThere is no player with the name {args.1} in the database.
§cOperator commands are disabled on this server.
§cYou do not have permission to use this command.

§cNot added at the moment (I'm sorry, will be in the next version of the add-on)
§cThe configuration menu is disabled on this server.
§a[EconMF] System activated. EconMF config file created in: plugin_data/Mineflow/configs/econfig
§e[EconMF] Warning! Deleting the econfig file may result in system breakage.

content.text: §eWarning! Don't touch any setting you don't know what it does.
